title: The Forgotten One (1989 - USA) [Kristy McNichol] horror
description:
The Forgotten One (1989 - USA)

Horror / Mystery / Romance

starring . . . . Terry O'Quinn, Kristy McNichol, Blair Parker
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0099601/


Bob Anderson is a budding novelist who has purchased a house in a small neighborhood to get some quality writing done on his next novel. He also recently lost his wife, and the grieving process hasn't really finished for him yet. Barbara lives next door, and she comes over from time to time to sort of tease Bob into thinking she likes him more than she does. The film starts out dark and heavy right from the get-go, because once Bob gets settled into the house, he finds himself dreaming of times from his past with a woman named Evelyn. He is also starting to see dark figures in the house, especially in the basement. The way the film deals with the ghost is creepy.


Video: XviD, 720x544, 25.000 fps, 928 Kbps, 01h33m46s
Audio: MP3, 48000 Hz, joint stereo, 103 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
